```{r}
library(tidyverse)
url<-'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/welcho2020/tidyverse/main/cat-lovers.csv'
cat_lovers <- read_csv(url)
```
```{r}
cat_lovers %>%
  summarise(mean_cats = mean(number_of_cats))
```
```{r}
?mean
```

```{r}
cat_lovers %>%
  summarise(mean_cats = mean(number_of_cats, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
glimpse(cat_lovers)
```

```{r}
cat_lovers %>%
  mutate(number_of_cats = case_when(
    name == "Ginger Clark" ~ 2,
    name == "Doug Bass"    ~ 3,
    TRUE                   ~ as.numeric(number_of_cats)
    )) %>%
  summarise(mean_cats = mean(number_of_cats))
```


```{r}
cat_lovers %>%
  mutate(
    number_of_cats = case_when(
      name == "Ginger Clark" ~ "2",
      name == "Doug Bass"    ~ "3",
      TRUE                   ~ number_of_cats
      ),
    number_of_cats = as.numeric(number_of_cats)
    ) %>%
  summarise(mean_cats = mean(number_of_cats))
```

```{r}
cat_lovers <- cat_lovers %>%
  mutate(
    number_of_cats = case_when(
      name == "Ginger Clark" ~ 2,
      name == "Doug Bass"    ~ 3,
      TRUE                   ~ number_of_cats
      ),
    number_of_cats = as.numeric(number_of_cats)
    )
```

## Data Types
# Logical


```{r}
typeof(TRUE)
```
# Character
```{r}
typeof("hello")
```
# Double
```{r}
typeof(1.33545)
```
```{r}
typeof(7)
```
# Integer
```{r}
typeof(7L)
```
```{r}
typeof(1:3)
```
## Concatenation

```{r}
c(1, 2, 3)
```
```{r}
c("Hello", "World!")
```
```{r}
c(c("hi", "hello"), c("bye", "jello"))
```
# Converting between types
```{r}
x <- 1:3
x
```
```{r}
typeof(x)
```
```{r}
y <- as.character(x)
y
```
```{r}
typeof(y)
```
```{r}
x <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
x
```
```{r}
typeof(x)
```
```{r}
y <- as.numeric(x)
y
```

```{r}
typeof(y)
```
```{r}
c(1, "Hello")
```
```{r}
c(FALSE, 3L)
```
```{r}
c(1.2, 3L)
```
```{r}
c(2L, "two")
```

## NA's Are Special
```{r}
x <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, NA)
mean(x)
```
```{r}
mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```
```{r}
summary(x)
```
```{r}
typeof(NA)
```
## NA is unknown, so it could be TRUE or FALSE
